TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit FontUnit extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示字型的大小。

span.span: Represents the size of a font.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件來變更的樣式屬性，針對多個控制項一次。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties for multiple controls at one time. 每次的其中一個`Style`屬性值變更，必須呼叫每個控制項，其方法。Each time one of the `Style` property values changes, each control must call its method. 在此範例中所包含的不是所有控制項都支援示範的所有屬性。Not all the controls included in this example support all the properties that are demonstrated. 如果控制項不支援特定的屬性，屬性值變更時，將不會變更控制項的外觀。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[StyleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/CS/styleclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[StyleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/VB/styleclassvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[StyleClass#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/CS/styleclasscs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[StyleClass#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/VB/styleclassvb.aspx#3)]

summary.span: 使用指定的字串，且該字串使用指定的 物件，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified string using the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式會辨識字串`value`如下表中建立的新執行個體類別。The constructor recognizes the strings for `value` that are shown in the following table to create a new instance of the class. |字串值String value|| |------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |`xx-small`、 `xxsmall``xx-small`, `xxsmall`|| |`x-small`, `xsmall``x-small`, `xsmall`|| |`x-large`, `xlarge``x-large`, `xlarge`|| |`xx-large`、 `xxlarge``xx-large`, `xxlarge`|| |`small`|| |`smaller`|| |`large`|| |`larger`|| |`medium`|| 在所有情況下，屬性具有值。In all cases, the property has the value . 字串比較不區分大小寫。The string comparison is case insensitive. 所有其他值的`value`的新執行個體藉由將建立類別`value`字型大小以及設定屬性設。For all other values of `value`, a new instance of the class is created by treating `value` as a font size and setting the property to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用欄位來表示物件屬性設定為`FontSize.Large`。Use the field to represent a object with the property set to `FontSize.Large`. 在 Internet Explorer 4.0 和更新版本，HTML 轉譯的控制項的輸出屬性設定為這個欄位是`style= "font-size:Large"`。In Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, the HTML rendered output from a control with the property set to this field is `style= "font-size:Large"`. 在瀏覽器中早於 Internet Explorer 4.0 中，HTML 轉譯的輸出是``。In browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 4.0, the HTML rendered output is ``.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用欄位來表示物件屬性設定為`FontSize.Small`。Use the field to represent a object with the property set to `FontSize.Small`. 在 Internet Explorer 4.0 和更新版本，HTML 轉譯的控制項的輸出屬性設定為這個欄位是`style= "font-size:Small"`。In Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, the HTML rendered output from a control with the property set to this field is `style= "font-size:Small"`. 在瀏覽器中早於 Internet Explorer 4.0 中，HTML 轉譯的輸出是``。In browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 4.0, the HTML rendered output is ``.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit Smaller
Public Shared ReadOnly Smaller As FontUnit

summary.span: 表示具有將 屬性設定為 的 物件。

span.span: Represents a object with the property set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用欄位來表示物件屬性設定為`FontSize.Smaller`。Use the field to represent a object with the property set to `FontSize.Smaller`. 在 Internet Explorer 4.0 和更新版本，HTML 轉譯的控制項的輸出屬性設定為這個欄位是`style= "font-size:Smaller"`。In Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, the HTML rendered output from a control with the property set to this field is `style= "font-size:Smaller"`. 在瀏覽器中早於 Internet Explorer 4.0 中，轉譯的輸出沒有 HTML 建立。In browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 4.0, no HTML rendered output is created. > [!NOTE] > 無法辨識某些 browers字型大小。Some browers do not recognize the font size. 請檢查您的瀏覽器的相容性。Check your browser for compatibility.

summary.span: 將 物件轉換成字串表示。

span.span: Converts the object to a string representation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 將 物件轉換成預設字串表示。

span.span: Converts the object to the default string representation.
The string representation of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來擷取的字串表示。Use the method to retrieve the string representation of the . 如果屬性設定為`FontSize.AsUnit`，則傳回的字串是字串相當於中所包含屬性。If the property is set to `FontSize.AsUnit`, the returned string is the string equivalent of the contained in the property. 如果屬性設定為任何其他的值，則傳回的字串是字串相當於值。If the property is set to any other value, the returned string is the string equivalent of the value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string ToString(class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed
Public Function ToString (culture As CultureInfo) As String

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: A that contains the culture to represent the .

summary.span: 使用指定的 ，將 物件轉換成字串表示。

span.span: Converts the object to a string representation, using the specified .

returns.span: 指定文化特性中 物件的字串表示。

span.span: The string representation of the object in the specified culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來擷取的字串表示中指定的文化特性。Use the method to retrieve the string representation of the in the specified culture. 如果屬性設定為`FontSize.AsUnit`，則傳回的字串是字串相當於中所包含屬性。If the property is set to `FontSize.AsUnit`, the returned string is the string equivalent of the contained in the property. 如果屬性設定為任何其他的值，則傳回的字串是字串相當於值。If the property is set to any other value, the returned string is the string equivalent of the value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string ToString(class System.IFormatProvider formatProvider) cil managed
Public Function ToString (formatProvider As IFormatProvider) As String

param.name: formatProvider
param.span: 提供文化特性特定格式資訊的 ，在 屬性被設定為 值時使用，否則忽略。

span.span: An that supplies culture-specific formatting information, which is used if the property is set to the value; otherwise, it is ignored.

summary.span: 使用指定的格式提供者，將 物件轉換成對等字串。

span.span: Converts a object to a string equivalent using the specified format provider.

returns.span: 字串，表示這個 ，包含由 指定之格式的任何數字單位值。

span.span: A string that represents this , with any numeric unit value in the format specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來擷取的字串表示物件使用的任何數值字串中的特定文化特性的格式提供者。Use the method to retrieve the string representation of the object using a culture-specific format provider for any numeric values that are in the string. 如果屬性設定為的值，則傳回的字串是對等的字串中包含的單位值屬性。If the property is set to the value, the returned string is the string equivalent of the unit value that is contained in the property. 數字部份值會使用指定格式化`formatProvider`。The numeric portion of the value is formatted using the specified `formatProvider`. 換句話說，當屬性設定為值，傳回的字串表示法使用產生單位物件儲存在方法屬性。In other words, when the property is set to the value, the returned string representation is generated using the method on the unit object that is stored in the property. 如果屬性設定為任何其他的值，則傳回的字串是字串相當於值。If the property is set to any other value, the returned string is the string equivalent of the value.
